summary: User requests the website codebase, including both frontend and backend.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide hero banner illustration of a modern car showroom with subtle ML/data overlay (car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg)
- Social share preview image with a car silhouette and abstract chart/ML motifs (ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg)

existing_features.title: Add a root-level developer documentation file that clearly explains where the frontend and backend source code lives in this project, highlights the main entry files, and documents how to run the app locally and how to deploy it on the Internet Computer.
Ensure the SEO/static images referenced by the frontend exist as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames already referenced in the codebase.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide full website code (frontend and backend)

projectName: Provide the full website source code structure (frontend + backend) with developer documentation and required static assets
